Posts.Content: My mother just had a mam. and they said that there was a shadowed area that was not there last year so she had a altrasound and they said the same thing and yesterday, she just went for a MRI.  SHe has a Aunt (I think) that had breast cancer but that is all that I know.   Should i be worried about this shadowed area? and has anyone ever heard of this?
Posts.Title: shadowed area ?
